sentences.en: Voters perceive him as a decisive and resolute international leader.
sentences.cn: 选民认识到他是一位果断、坚定的国际领袖。

sentences.en: It is a resolute advocate of the anti-global movement.
sentences.cn: 它是反全球化运动的坚定倡导者。

sentences.en: Earlier generations said they wanted their children to be like Lincoln: principled, kind, compassionate, resolute.
sentences.cn: 前几代人说，他们希望自己的孩子能像林肯一样：有原则、善良、有同情心、果断。
